LanguageData.GTF_FishingNetAdvanced.label: advanced fishing net
LanguageData.GTF_FishingNetAdvanced.description: An advanced fishing net for catching large amounts of fish in deeper water. More durable and equipped with sensors and electronic lures.
LanguageData.GTF_FishingNetBasic.label: simple fishing net
LanguageData.GTF_FishingNetBasic.description: A simple wooden fishing net for catching fish in shallow water. Not very strong and prone to breaking.
LanguageData.GTF_FishingNetComplex.label: complex fishing net
LanguageData.GTF_FishingNetComplex.description: A complex fishing net for catching fish in shallow water and chest deep water. More durable and better at trapping fish.
LanguageData.GTF_FishingNetIce.label: ice fishing net
LanguageData.GTF_FishingNetIce.description: A unique fishing net designed to catch fish under the ice.
